name: DollopDash
description:
DollopDash was a small work project where I had to come up with a creative way to sell a single word. 

The word was "Dollop" so, came up with DollopDash, a game where you are a cup of coffee and you have to collect dollops of cream to keep the timer going while avoiding other dollops of food.

If you catch the wrong color you lose 2secs from the timer, but if you catch cream you add 2secs.
